p: Moreover, the antibody against a certain virus serotype may provoke the antibody-dependent enhancement, which can lead to dengue haemorrhagic fever (DHF) or dengue shock syndrome (DSS), following the subsequent heteroserotype infection. Therefore, after a lengthy period of serotype 1 epidemics, the epidemic of another serotype can lead to an increased incidence of DHF/DSS cases in Guangzhou.
